translations.404: You're looking for a page that never existed, no longer exists or our server is messing up on its own.
translations.Ei oikeuksia: You don't have needed user rights
translations.Ei oikeuksia-näkymä: You either do not have the rights to this to see it, or the information you are looking for does not exist.
translations.Ei oikeutta kysymykseen: You do not have read access to this question.
translations.Ei osallistujana-otsikko: You are not a participant in this course.
translations.Ei osallistujana-viesti: You cannot add or view personal questions asked in the course
translations.Ei yhtään UKK: No frequently asked questions have been added.
translations.Entä uusia ideoita, miten voisimme jatko: Or new ideas, how we could further develop this system? Or any other thoughts related to this system?
translations.Ei voi poistaa kysymystä: A question cannot be removed if there are comments on it
translations.Järjestelmään tallennettu sähköpostiosoi: E-mail address saved in the system.
translations.Kirjautumispalveluun ei saatu yhteyttä: The login service could not be reached
translations.Kommentin lisääminen epäonistui: Adding a comment to a question failed.
translations.Kommentin lisääminen: Adding a comment to a question was successful.
translations.Kurssialueen, jolla järjestelmä on käytö: The course area where the system is in use
translations.Kysymysten lisäkenttien haku epäonnistui: Failed to retrieve additional fields for questions
translations.Kysymyksen lisäämisestä ei vahvistusta: No confirmation of the success of adding the question was received.
translations.Lähetä minulle sähköpostia tulleista kys: Send me notifications about new questions and comments
translations.Lähetetään liitetiedostoja: Sending attachments, please wait a moment...
translations.Lisäkentän tietojen haku epäonnistui: Failed to retrieve additional field data
translations.Luotava tili on jo olemassa: The account you're trying to create already exists
translations.Minulle saa lähettää sähköpostia käyttäj: Send me requests to collect user feedback
translations.Ohjelmistosta: This is software produced by the Diginet project. Diginet is a project funded by the European Social Fund which is developed in cooperation between the University of Oulu and Oulu University of Applied Sciences.
translations.Onko sinulla ongelmia tämän järjestelmän: Do you have problems with this system?
translations.Paina enter valinnan kirjoittamisen jälk: Press enter after typing an option.
translations.Palautteen antaminen on täysin vapaaehto: Giving us feedback is completely voluntary. Thank you!
translations.Palvelimelta haettavaa tietoa ei löytyny: Retrievable information from server not found
translations.Poistaa kaiken järjestelmään tallennetut: Deletes all your data stored in the system, including personal information, questions, comments, attachments and login information.
translations.puuttuu kurssiID: No course ID was found. Check URL address spelling.
translations.Roolisi kurssilla: Your role in the course (teacher / student)
translations.Salasanan pituus: A least {$INTERPOLATION} characters long password is required.
translations.Tallennamme seuraavat tiedot: We store the following information from Moodle in our database:
translations.Tietojenkäyttösuostumus: This is the ticketing system built by the Diginet project for discussion and questions between teachers and students in the course. The software needs a personal account to allow you to submit and view personal questions. To do this, you need to know who you are, under which course you are on and what you are doing on the course. By creating an account you provide authorise the transfer of this information for use by the ticketing system. If you are interested in how we handle your data, you can read our privacy statement.
translations.Tiedoston koko ylittää: Size of the file exceeds the 10 megabyte limit
translations.UKK lähettäminen onnistui: Sending a new frequently asked question was successful.
translations.UKK näyttäminen epäonnistui: Displaying a frequently asked question failed
translations.Uuden kysymyksen lähettäminen onnistui: Sending a new question was successful.
translations.UKK poisto epäonnistui: Failed to remove frequently asked question
translations.UKK lisääminen epäonnistui: Failed to send a frequently asked question
The connection to the server failed.
translations.Yhtään lisäkenttää ei ole lisätty: No additional fields have been added.
translations.Yleisen tietosuoja-asetuksen mukainen ti: Data acquisition request in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation. You can download all your own data.
